1.content: If were all set let's go.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: Leon had decided that he would leave in the morning. That way he could get the most out of the day. At about 8:30 he was off on his adventure. Sadly, he didn't know where to go from here. All of a sudden, it got dark aruond him. Inside this darkness was a bright light. A voice spoke to him saying:"Leon....you must go east towards the Volcano. There you will find the first piece of Zoulton. At each location a beam of light will shine from the darkness, and show you the way to the second piece. Hurry....there isn't much time."After the voice had left and the darkenss arose, he knew where he would go, and so, he set off towards the Volcano. He had no idea what was in store for him, but he knew he had to do it, for the fate of the world.
11.title: Morning

info.brief_description: This is the start of an epic adventure to purge evil from ths Land of Sardonia
info.description:
There once was a lowly peasant, who lived in the village of Halgrone. Ruled by King Selan. The evil wizard has attacked the town, and stolen the 7 parts of the Legendary Sword of Zoulton. This young man, who is named Leon, will soon set out to defeat the Evil Wizard. And this is where our story begins.

Do not write anything above the "E" rating. This is a story for all ages, so keep it that way.

For reference:
Blue Text=Narrator Talking
Red Text=Person Talking
Black Text=Hero Talking

Please use these colors for the appropriate Text.

Thanks and go nuts :D
info.pretty_title: The Legendary Sword of Zoulton Part 1
